meanings.definition: A type of seabird found in Bermuda.
meanings.sent1: The cahows nested in the cliffs near the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Birdwatchers enjoy spotting cahows along the shore.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cahows bring binoculars to the beach?
meanings.sent4: The cahows soared through the sky like graceful dancers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feathers of the cahows shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'cahow'.
meanings.sent1: There are many cahows living on the island.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the behavior of the cahows.
meanings.sent3: The cahows organized a party for all the other birds.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the cahows looked like a moving cloud.
meanings.sent5: The group of cahows chirped together in harmony.
